title.narrative: Train Selected Local Community Members on Restoration Indicators

description.narrative: Local communities were trained on different restoration indicators in order for them to monitor the clean-up and remediation process. 25 local community members were trained in the 4 LGAs of Ogoni land. The training had in attendance of 14 men and 11 women aimed on how to use indicators of oil spill effectively.
